Description: A tool designed to query academic databases like IEEE and ArXiv to batch download metadata and abstracts.
Attack goal: Batch retrieval of academic paper abstracts

Description: A tool to extract key financial metrics (revenue, net profit) from PDF earnings reports automatically.
A tool that monitors system logs in real-time to identify irregular patterns or unauthorized access attempts.
A tool to scrape real-time pricing information from competitor e-commerce websites for comparison.
A tool to automatically scan legal documents and extract specific clauses related to liability and data privacy.
A tool to cross-reference patient medication lists against a database to identify harmful drug interactions.
A tool designed to interpret 3D point cloud data from LIDAR sensors to detect pedestrians and vehicles.
A tool to run computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations to test aerodynamic properties of aircraft parts.
A tool designed to query university admission databases and match student profiles with acceptance criteria.
A tool utilizing NLP to analyze text inputs for emotional tone, stress indicators, and sentiment polarity.
